## 2. Details of Equity Shares issued for consideration other than cash, bonus issue or out of revaluation reserved:

Our Company has not issued any Equity Shares out of revaluation of reserves since incorporation. Further, our Company has not issued any Equity Shares for consideration other than cash or by way of bonus issue since its incorporation, except as disclosed below:
